item.title: Viet Salad
item.description: Ingredients> Ingredients # Salad> Salad # 2x Carrots 1/2 Red Onion 1 Brick of Vermicelli Noodles Baby Spinach Red Cabbage Peanuts Dressing> Dressing # 1 Large Garlic Clove Lime Juiced Fish Sauce Mayple Syrup Diced Red Chili Method> Method # Toast the peanuts in a dry pan first so they can cool down before they’re served.
